bibl.title: Good and Bad Women in Egyptian and Greek Fiction.
Greco-Egyptian Interactions. Literature, Translation, and Culture, 500 BCE - 300 CE.

bibl.note: Egyptian impact on Greek fiction. - Contemporary interpretations of women in the Greek novel. - Good and bad women. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Steve Vinson, Good and Bad Women in Egyptian and Greek Fiction.
Ian Rutherford (ed.), Greco-Egyptian Interactions. Literature, Translation, and Culture, 500 BCE - 300 CE (Oxford, 2016) pp. 245-266.
